name: Major White: First Strike (early access)
description:
Major White: First Strike is a side scroller shoot-em-up, where you mostly fight against weaponized drones and robots.
Major Jacob White, is a tough soldier fighting against even tougher odds. 

His mission is to get to a remote military island and take dead or alive a scientist that has taken control of all the automated weapons and killed all the soldiers.

Wanting revenge for his brothers in arms, Major White is ready to bring this traitor to  justice.

v0.5 early access: contains 1 procedurally generated level without health packs or upgrades, just a pistol, shotgun, and a light machinegun. Can you survive till the end?

Updates and extra levels, along with the story are  coming soon.

ps. Major White: First strike is part of a larger universe with a lot of unexpected stories, plot twists and surprises. Support the 1 dev(myself) to bring these stories to life. thx.
